I had a tiered list of prospects through the 2nd round and I don't even think that I had Shamet on the list

His jumper has always looked pure. Look at his collegiate catch and shoot numbers. His ability to defend and overall poise have been the biggest surprise. He seemed to have enough size/length when he does not need to be an elite athlete. Projects as Courtney Lee w/ PG skills
Shamet's surprising defense makes him a viable option as future starter, either beside or in place of Fultz. Sort of a poor man's version of what that expected from Fultz.
He's been a pleasant surprise, I didn't expect much out of Shamet in October and November, I love the confidence he has from beyond the arc
Surprisingly, watching Shamet and Redick be professional shooters/scorers has been second only to Embiid in terms Sixers viewing enjoyment this season. Need to have fun Dario back in our lives.
